title: "Regulatory norms for Artificial Intelligence by June-July"
excerpt: "The government will come out with a draft regulatory framework for artificial intelligence (AI) by June-July, after holding extensive discussions with the industry, minister of state of electronics and IT, Rajeev Chandrasekhar said on Tuesday."
